#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>


bool is_palindrome2( int num )
{
    int real = num/10;
    int n_dg = (int)(log10(num)+1);
    int div = (n_dg%2 == 1) ? (n_dg/2)+1 : n_dg/2;     
    int result = num %10;
    n_dg = (n_dg/2)-1;
    
    while( n_dg > 0 )
    {
        result = (result * 10)+ (real%10);
        --n_dg;
        real /= 10;
    }
    int n_num = num/(int)pow(10.0,div);
    return ( n_num == result) || n_num==0;
}

int main() 
{
    
    int n;
    int n_test;
    scanf( "%d",&n );
    while( n-->0 )
    {        
        scanf( "%d",&n_test );
        for( ;n_test<1000001;++n_test )
        {
            if( is_palindrome2( n_test ) ) break;
        }
        printf( "%d\n",n_test );
    }
    
    return 0;
}
